source.name: Fill in the Blank Demo Question
source.instructions:
## Fill in the Blank Example
Fill in the blanks below.
source.text:
True or False: Python is a compiled language. <<<False>>>
True or False: You do not use semi-colons at the end of each line of code in Python. <<<True>>>
source.guidance:
Python is an interpreted language.
Python does not use semi-colons. Instead it uses whitespace.

text: True or False: Python is a compiled language.
True or False: You do not use semi-colons at the end of each line of code in Python.
